page.title: 05RECREATION AND LEISURE
page.content: {RECREATION AND LEISURE} Recreation facilities in the area centre on public open spaces,playing fields,public houses,villages,country footpaths and community halls. Two senior schools, Leylands and Lea Manor, provide varied sports amenities.The latter plays a more important part in the overall provision of public recreational facilities in the area. Surveys on leisure time across the urban districts within the area of study provided the following information on what activities local population either enjoyed as spectators or participants. After the age of eighteen participation in outdoor sports begins to fall quite rapidly.
